metadata.campaign: The Nine Lives of Liberty - Episode 1
metadata.purpose: Character stat blocks with visual descriptions for image generation

georgeWashington.name: General George Washington
georgeWashington.title: Commander-in-Chief, Continental Army
georgeWashington.description: Tall imposing figure (6'2"), late 40s, powdered white hair tied back, steely blue-gray eyes, weathered face with determined expression, prominent nose and strong jawline. Wears dark blue Continental Army coat with buff facings and gold epaulettes, white waistcoat, buff breeches, black riding boots. Black tricorn hat with gold trim. Commands respect through presence alone.
abilities: Aura of Protection (+5 to saves within 10ft)

nathanaelGreene.name: Major General Nathanael Greene
nathanaelGreene.title: Northern Column Commander
nathanaelGreene.description: Solid build, early 40s, dark brown hair, sharp intelligent gray eyes, slight limp from old injury. Clean-shaven with serious expression. Wears dark blue Continental officer's coat with buff trim, practical rather than ornate. Always carries maps and tactical notes. Projects quiet competence.

johnSullivan.name: Major General John Sullivan
johnSullivan.title: Western Column Commander
johnSullivan.description: Broad-shouldered Irish-American, mid-40s, thick reddish-brown hair, fierce green eyes, strong jaw with slight stubble. Stocky and powerful build. Wears Continental blue coat, often unbuttoned, shirt sleeves rolled up for action. Carries himself like a brawler who became an officer. Intense, ready-for-anything expression.

guardGus.name: Unteroffizier Gustav 'Gus' Hoffmann
guardGus.title: Veteran Cellar Guard
guardGus.description: Heavyset German man in late 40s, gray-streaked brown hair, tired bloodshot eyes with dark circles underneath, scruffy beard. Wears blue Hessian uniform coat with corporal stripes, slightly wrinkled and stained. Brass-fronted grenadier mitre cap sits askew on head. Weary, world-worn expression. Has rolled up sleeves, holds lantern in one hand, saber at hip. Looks like he'd rather be sleeping.
guardGus.personality: Tired, professional, 20 years of service. Poor gambler. Has soft spot for his daughter back home.
guardGus.quote: "Ach, mein Gott, not anuzzer rat! I tell ze Kapit√§n, ve need cats down here!"
guardGus.tactics: Will fight to defend post but can be bribed (10+ gold). Falls asleep if too quiet.

klaus.name: Klaus - The Card Shark
klaus.title: Hessian Guard
klaus.description: Lean, wiry German man in mid-30s, slicked-back blonde hair, sharp cunning blue eyes, thin mustache, smug grin showing missing tooth. Blue Hessian infantry coat unbuttoned at top, neckerchief loose, sleeves rolled up. Has deck of marked cards in hand, several empty tankards nearby. Cocky, relaxed posture leaning back in chair. Flushed face from drinking and winning.
klaus.personality: Cheater at cards, currently winning and drunk. Cocky and overconfident.
klaus.quote: "Ha! I vin again! You boys owe me anuzzer round!"
klaus.tactics: Will fight but flee if seriously injured. Cheats even in combat if possible.
klaus.location: Ground Floor - Main Hall, playing cards by fireplace

fritz.name: Fritz - The Complainer
fritz.title: Hessian Guard
fritz.description: Stocky German man in late 20s, messy brown hair sticking up, perpetual scowl, droopy brown eyes, unshaven stubble. Blue Hessian coat with food stains, shirt untucked. Slumped posture, constantly gesturing in complaint. Cards scattered in front of him (losing hand), nearly empty tankard. Expression of perpetual dissatisfaction.
fritz.personality: Complains about everything. Cold, food, America, the war. Currently losing at cards.
fritz.quote: "Zis country is too cold! Ze food is terrible! Vy did I leave Deutschland?"
fritz.tactics: Will fight but morale is low. First to surrender or flee.
fritz.location: Ground Floor - Main Hall, playing cards

wilhelm.name: Wilhelm - The Homesick One
wilhelm.title: Hessian Guard
wilhelm.description: Handsome young German man, early 20s, sandy blonde hair, sad blue eyes staring into distance, clean-shaven with melancholic expression. Blue Hessian uniform neat but shoulders slumped. Sitting alone by fireplace, clutching a miniature portrait and letter. Looks like he'd rather be anywhere else. Romantic, distant gaze.
wilhelm.personality: Melancholy, staring at fire. Has sweetheart named Greta waiting back home.
wilhelm.quote: "Greta vaits for me... I hope she still remembers mein face..."
wilhelm.tactics: Hesitant to fight. Can be reasoned with. Might flee to return home.
wilhelm.location: Ground Floor - Main Hall, by fireplace
wilhelm.status: Lightly drunk, homesick, staring at portrait
equipment: Love letter from Greta (worn from re-reading)

captainKleist.name: Captain Heinrich Kleist
captainKleist.title: Hessian Commander
captainKleist.description: Tall, distinguished German officer in late 30s, immaculately groomed jet-black hair and elaborate curled mustache (his pride), aristocratic features, sharp nose. Wears ornate blue Hessian officer's coat with gold trim and epaulettes, red sash, polished boots. Currently PASSED OUT drunk in chair, coat unbuttoned, wig askew, mouth open snoring, mustache drooping. Multiple empty wine bottles nearby.
drunkPenalties: Automatically fails STR and DEX saves
DC 15 CON save to wake if shaken/injured
captainKleist.personality: Arrogant when sober, competent leader. Currently DRUNK and passed out. Obsessed with mustache.
captainKleist.quote: (When conscious) "Mein mustache is ze finest in ze regiment! Colonel Rall himself envies it!"
captainKleist.tactics: Competent when sober. Commands respect. Uses tactical positioning.
captainKleist.status: Passed out drunk in ornate chair
equipment: Hessian Officer's Gorget (MAGIC ITEM - +1 AC, Adv. Intimidation, Command 1/day)
Ornate officer's coat with gold trim
Map of Trenton with Hessian positions

genericHessian.name: Hessian Ground Troop
genericHessian.title: Generic Soldier Template
genericHessian.description: German soldier, varied ages (18-45), wearing Prussian blue infantry coat with brass buttons and white crossbelts, matching blue breeches, black gaiters. Brass-fronted grenadier mitre cap with regimental insignia. Carries musket with bayonet. Most are drunk from Christmas celebrations - flushed faces, disheveled uniforms, unsteady on feet. Various hair colors (blonde, brown, black), varied builds.
drunkPenalties: Want to get back to drinking, not looking for trouble

variants.sleeping: Passed out in barracks, snoring, uniform disheveled
variants.eating: In kitchen with Signora, stuffing face with food
variants.drinking: In main hall, celebrating Christmas, singing German songs
variants.onGuard: At gate, trying to look professional but clearly drunk

genericHessian.count: Approximately 40 total in barracks during infiltration window

signoraBattaglia.name: Signora Maria Battaglia
signoraBattaglia.title: Head Cook / Nonna Network Operative
signoraBattaglia.description: Plump Italian grandmother, early 60s, silver-gray hair in tight bun under white cap, warm brown eyes that miss nothing, round pleasant face with laugh lines. Wears traditional cook's apron (flour-dusted) over simple brown dress, wooden spoon tucked in apron pocket (secret Nonna Network symbol). Moves with surprising energy, constantly stirring pots or kneading dough. Has that 'don't mess with me' Italian grandmother aura despite kind smile.
abilities: Healing Food: Meals restore 2d8+3 HP (1 hour prep)
Network Contact: Send messages via Nonna Network
Distraction: Create kitchen 'accidents' to draw guards
signoraBattaglia.personality: Feeds everyone, takes offense if you refuse food. Secretly gathers intelligence for Continental Army. Treats everyone like her grandchildren - firmly but lovingly.
signoraBattaglia.quote: "You are too skinny! Sit, sit! Mangia! I make you proper meal, not zis Hessian garbage!"
signoraBattaglia.tactics: Non-combatant. Uses kitchen as cover. Will help patriots if they're polite and appreciate food.
equipment: Small vial of sleeping herbs (for 'special' wine)

specialRecipe.name: Signora's Miraculous Lasagna
specialRecipe.effect: Wakes A.G. Achilles from lasagna coma instantly
specialRecipe.ingredients: Love, Italian herbs, proper cheese, tomatoes, prayer

agAchilles.name: A.G. Achilles
agAchilles.description: Plump orange tabby cat with distinctive black stripes, white chest and paws. Bright green eyes (currently closed in unconscious state). Pink nose, white whiskers. Soft, fluffy fur. Currently curled up in ball, belly prominently displayed, snoring softly. Smells faintly of lasagna. Has small leather collar with brass tag reading 'A.G.' Looks completely harmless and adorable in sleep.
agAchilles.trueFormHint: Occasionally glows faintly orange in moonlight. Shadows sometimes show a much larger cat silhouette. Reality seems slightly... bendable... around him.

stats.note: Cat form only - true stats unknown and terrifying

recovery.afterWaking: Can shapeshift again, will explain quest for Shield of Infinite Lasagna

traits: Monday Vulnerability: Hates Mondays, disadvantage on all checks
Lasagna Obsession: Will do anything for good lasagna
Nine Lives: Can return from death (mysterious cosmic respawn)
Cosmic Knowledge: Knows things beyond mortal understanding
Reality Bender: When conscious, can manipulate probability around food
agAchilles.questRole: Primary objective - must be rescued to progress campaign
agAchilles.personality: Lazy, sarcastic, food-obsessed cosmic trickster. Speaks in dry monotone when conscious. Pretends to be just a cat but clearly isn't. Has cosmic knowledge he shares cryptically between demanding lasagna.
agAchilles.quote: (When awake) "I hate Mondays. And being imprisoned. Mostly I hate being imprisoned on a Monday. Now where's my lasagna?"
secrets: Is actually an aspect of the cosmic entity Garfield
Knows location of Shield of Infinite Lasagna
Has lived multiple lives throughout American Revolution
Chose cat form because 'cats are perfect, unlike Mondays'

notes.language: Hessians speak German (use Dwarvish as game mechanic)
notes.morale: Most Hessians prefer to avoid combat - drunk, homesick, or tired
notes.reinforcements: If alarm raised, 2d6 additional troops arrive in 1d4+2 rounds
notes.historical: ~45 Hessians at Old Barracks during infiltration, rest with Colonel Rall at his HQ
notes.imageStyle: Recommend oil painting or realistic historical illustration style for all character portraits
